name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: aHrefs Search Volume & CPC Anchor Enhancer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds keyword cpc, competition and search volume to aHrefs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When analyzing anchor text it's useful to know the CPC and search volume of the keywords that are linked with. Now you can see what high volume, high CPC your competitors are optimizing for and tell on them

Be sure to set your API key in the options or it wont work!

Get an API key from:
http://grepwords.com
